## PR Checklist â€” Starship Lander

### Scope & Intent
- [ ] This PR has one primary goal (feature/fix/refactor/docs).
- [ ] This PR does not mix phases (e.g., Game Center + ads + campaign in one PR).
- [ ] I can explain the change in 1-2 sentences.

### Build & Run
- [ ] Builds in Release configuration.
- [ ] Runs on at least one real device (not only Simulator).
- [ ] No new runtime warnings/errors in console (or listed below).

### Gameplay Regression Safety
- [ ] Verified landing success/failure still behaves correctly.
- [ ] Verified scoring unchanged (or intentionally changed & documented).
- [ ] Verified controls (buttons + tilt if enabled) still feel correct.

### Feature Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Acceptance criteria defined below (what "done" means).
- [ ] All acceptance criteria satisfied.

### Documentation (must update if applicable)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated (Added/Changed/Fixed).
- [ ] PROJECT_LOG.md appended (date, goal, files, decisions, follow-ups).
- [ ] RELEASE_NOTES.md updated (only if release candidate).
- [ ] README.md updated (only if user-facing behavior changed).
- [ ] DECISIONS.md updated if any tradeoff/threshold/policy changed.

### Privacy / Compliance (if applicable)
- [ ] If any SDK/user data flow was added/changed, App Privacy impact is documented.
- [ ] If tracking/ads behavior changed, ATT flow is verified and notes added.

### Testing Notes
- [ ] I wrote "How to test" steps below with exact taps/paths.
- [ ] Edge cases tested (listed below).

### Risk Management
- [ ] Risk level: Low / Medium / High
- [ ] Rollback plan described (if Medium/High).
- [ ] Follow-ups created (if any).

**Why:**
